content: Try without having your antivirus scanning outgoing mail. Or even with it turned off as outgoing email go into the system temp folder while sending and antivirus is more than capable of hanging the send process long enough for it to time out.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
So you want someone to spend an hour explaining to you how IMAP and POP work.

Fundamentally you will not have a delay with mail in your inbox in IMAP mail accojnts where the server supports push notification via the IDLE IMAP command (that iu google, others may support it. Check with your provider).

Otherwise you are limited to the frequency of mail checking in your account settings.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Toto se děje ve všech mailech? Zkus Thunderbird spustit do Režimu řešení potíží (z nabídky Nápověda).
creator: poljos-moz

content: - Thunderbir - Označím email na vytlačenie - Prejdem do spodného okna s textom emailu - v spodnom okienku je vpravo hore dlaždica "Ďalšie" - Klik - "tlačiť" a vytlačíte iba to, čo vidíte v spodnom okienku.
creator: Ansamb
